sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The life and death of Sir Phillip Sidney, late lord gouernour of Flushing his funerals solemnized in Paules Churche where he lyeth interred; with the whole order of the mournfull shewe, as they marched thorowe the citie of London, on Thursday the 16 of February. 1587. Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
[16] p.
Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre neere vnto Sommerset-house, At London : 1587.
Dedication signed: Iohn Philip. In verse. Running title reads: The lyfe, death and funerals of Sir Philip Sidney knight. Signatures: A-B⁴. Some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The life and death of Sir Phillip Sidney, late lord gouernour of Flushing his funerals solemnized in Paules Churche where he lyeth interred; with the whole order of the mournfull shewe, as they marched thorowe the citie of London, on Thursday the 16 of February. 1587. Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
[16] p.
Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre neere vnto Sommerset-house, At London : 1587.
Dedication signed: Iohn Philip. In verse. Running title reads: The lyfe, death and funerals of Sir Philip Sidney knight. Signatures: A-B⁴. Some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Robert Walde-graue
Temple-barre neere vnto Sommerset-house
